text: They have indeed not believed who say, "Allah is certainly the Messiah, the son of Maryam." Say, "Then who has power against Allah in anything, if He intends to destroy the Messiah, the son of Maryam and his mother and whoever is on the earth, all together?" And the kingdom of the skies and the earth and (all) that is between them is Allah's. He creates that which He wills and Allah has power over everything
